verses.text: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w You|strong="H6963"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; come \w quickly|strong="H2363"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*. \w Hear|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6963"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w strike|strong="H1986"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*; let \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* act \w of|strong="H7218"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w*. \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; let \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w refuse|strong="H5106"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w ever|strong="H5750"\w* against \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w deeds|strong="H2617"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* fixed \w on|strong="H5869"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w*. \w In|strong="H5315"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w seek|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w*; \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w leave|strong="H6168"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w defenseless|strong="H6168"\w*.\f + \fr 141:8 \ft Or do not pour out my life or do not give me over to death\f*

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w snares|strong="H4170"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w laid|strong="H3369"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* lures \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w evildoers|strong="H6466"\w*.
